A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Biggest flop in SW history. Horrible story telling\, killed nearly all continuity and context. Poor decisions\, bad writing and characters we are forced to care about... but still don't. They ruined all potential with the classic characters\, opting for quick gimmicks and surprises over good character arcs. It's a pretty film\, Disney production but\, it pretty much ruins Star  Wars for me.
